task.summary: Default task
Fix a bug with i18next namespaces
Fix that f* webpack bug !!!!!!
[WIP] adding changes made on chefsquare.com
Add Procfile for preproduction

[BREAKING CHANGES] Upgrade material-ui from 1.5.1 to 3.6.2
See https://github.com/mui-org/material-ui/releases for more details
Upgrade some modules
Upgrade some modules
Upgrade postcss-import, postcss-loader, postcss-sass and precss
Upgrade some modules
Refactoring config files
Add the ResponsiveModal component from Chefsquare (can be useful)
Add the ResponsiveModal component from Chefsquare (can be useful)
[WIP] router refactoring
[WIP] Router refactoring - better LangSwitch and query params handling
Add a method to the server to check the validity of the given routes
Add colors to the terminal ðŸ‘§
Update the doc of some components
Use new React.memo feature on some components
Fix a bug in the router (lang hydration)
[WIP] documentation - add pages and starting page-builder component
Fix locales bug
Fix locales bug
Update docs
Improve the way the server is handling the routes translations
Update readme
Update readme
Update, improve and fix tests + improve the router dispatcher
Fix env config
update package.json
Update production .env file
Add some env vars for production (actually staging on heroku)
Add missing pm2 dependency
Add pm2 lauching script
Allow to keep dev tooling pages on production
Update package-lock.json file
Update env config to fix some issues on staging server
[WIP] Update docs + add a get-started page
Update LangSwitch component to handle new routes structure
Hide temporary the LangSwitch component when the routes translation is disable
Update doc
Update doc

Improve the way the language is detected when enableRouteTranslation is disabled
Add a way to detected the language from an url query (lang)

Improve the LangSwitch component
- It now works on the server side - It works when routes translation is disabled - It works when JavaScript is disabled on the client side as well :D
Add a "components" article to the doc
Add a github link on the Header
Allow to disable the whole translation services
Remove useless helper function
Translation _sandbox + add a .env.development file
Update some material-ui overrides to fit the new patterns
